casebody.data:
Samuel WALKER, et al., Appellants
v.
TOWN OF ORLEANS Supreme Court of Indiana. May 14, 2019 Denied. All Justices concur, except David, J., who, pursuant to Indiana Appellate Rule 42, would strike Appellants' petition to transfer as impertinent, scandalous, and inappropriate and therefore dismiss the transfer proceedings with prejudice. Najam, J., Crone, J., Pyle, J.
